entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump Poll Time!
Should President Trump invite to the White House the French doctor Didier Raoult, MD, PhD who conducted a relatively large positive study of Hydroxychloroquine https://t.co/mbTwou3ktM and architects of very successful (vithout lockdowns) Swedish approach to coronavirus
